title: Identify the input values
text: When considering $$y$$ as a function of $$x$$, the input variable is $$x$$.

title: Identify the output values
text: When considering $$y$$ as a function of $$x$$, the output variable is $$y$$.

title: Classify the relation
text: Because each $$x$$ leads to two diffierent $$y$$ $$(y=\sqrt{1-x^2}$$, y=-sqrt(1-x**2)), $$y$$ is not a function of $$x$$.
speech: Because each  x  leads to two diffierent  y   parentheses y is equal to the square root of 1 minus x squared end root , y=-sqrt(1-x**2)),  y  is not a function of  x .
